name: Overlord Slayer
description:
Battle against waves of enemies and work towards defeating the overlord. You earn additional potions as you clear more waves and the strength of the overlord varies depending on what wave you're on.

This game was developed in Unreal Engine 4 for My First Game Jam Summer 2016

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D - Move
  • Mouse - Look
  • Left click - Attack
  • E - Potion
  • Esc - Quit

Asset used:

  • Stock Unreal Engine 4 assets
  • Character, enemy, boss models and animations from Mixamo
  • Rogue's Talon by Quandtum
  • Wooden Door by Danimal and Yughues
  • Blade of Damascus Steel by Anafeyka

Developed by yours truly.

I documented the development process here.
